parameters.name: searchJobDef
parameters.description:
Field NameDescriptionData Type
CityJob location citystring
companyIdJD internal company IDinteger($int64)
companynameCompany Namestring
contactIdJD internal ID of the contact assigned to the jobinteger($int64)
countryIdJob location country two-letter abbreviation (Required if zip code is specified and defaults to US if not specified)string
ismyjobFlag to filter for jobs that have the API user listed as a user on the jobboolean
issuedatefromLower boundary of the issue date rangestring($date-time)
issuedatetoLower boundary of the issue date rangestring($date-time)
jobidJD internal job IDinteger($int64)
jobdivarefClient reference numberstring
jobtypeArray of job types, valid values(case insensitive): Direct Placement - Contract - Right to Hire - Full Time/Contract [string]
optionalrefJD reference numberstring
startdatefromLower boundary of the start date rangestring($date-time)
startdatetoUpperboundary of the start date rangestring($date-time)
stateJob location state (Complete state name or two-letter abbreviation)[string]
statusJob status (0 - OPEN; 1 - ON HOLD; 2 - FILLED; 3 - CANCELLED; 4 - CLOSED; 5 - EXPIRED; 6 - IGNORED)integer($int32)
titleJob titlestring
zipcodeJob location zip codestring
zipcoderadiusSearch radius of the zip code of the target jobsinteger($int32)
showAllOpenJobsShow jobs with OPEN and treat-as-OPEN stasuses (only applicable when 'status' = 0)boolean
onlyMyPrimaryJobsFilter by user's jobs where they are a primary recruiter or primary salesperson (only applicable when 'ismyjob' = true)boolean

parameters.name: createContactDef
parameters.description:
company : Company Name 
firstname : Contact First Name 
lastname : Contact Last Name 
title : Title 
department : Department 
phones :  Set at most 4 phone numbers.
 Set numbers and extensions in phone and ext respectively.
 Set action to 1 for insertion.
 Do not set extensions for types other than work phone or pager.
Valid type (case insensitive)
Value
Description
W
Work #
H
Home #
C
Cell #
F
Work Fax
X
Home Fax
P
Pager
M
Main #
D
Direct #
O
Other # 
 
addresses :  Set default to true for a default address. One and only one address can be set as default.
 addressid can be left unset.
 Set action to 1 for insertion. 
 
email : Email 
 alternateemail : Alternate Email 
 types : Array of contact types, valid values can be found through Leader Tools  My Team  Manage Contact Types. 
owners :  Set primary to true for at most one owner.  Set either ownerid or both firstname and lastname(owner name). 
reportsto : Valid only if company is set. 
primary : Primary contact 
assistantname : Assistant Name 
assistantemail : Assistant Email 
assistantphone : Assistant Phone 
assistantphoneextension : Assistant Phone Extension 
subguidelines : Submittal Instructions 
maxsubmittals : Max Allowed Submittals 
references : References 
drugtest : Drug Test 
backgroundcheck : Background Check 
securityclearance : Security Clearance

parameters.name: createContactNoteDef

contactid : Contact ID 
note : Note 
recruiterid : Creator ID, defaults to API user ID if not set. 
action : Contact action. Valid action type can be found through Leader Tools  My Team  Manage Contact Actions. Please make sure the chosen action type is already activated. 
actionDate Action date, defaults to current date and time, can only be set when contact action is set. 
link2AnOpenJob : Job ID 
link2ACandidate : Candidate ID

parameters.name: createJobDef
parameters.description:
Field NameDescriptionData Type
UserfieldsAdd user defined field(s)array[object]
userfieldIdInternal JD UDF ID. Retrivable from Settings/Customize/Job UDFs[integer($int32)]
userfieldValueDesired value of user defined field being added[string]
address1Primary address information of jobstring
address2Secondary address information of jobstring
attachmentsAdd attachment(s)array[object]
descriptionAttachment description[string]
entityIdAttachment type. Values retrievable at Settings/Lables/Attachment Types: Companies[integer($int64)]
expenseRecordIdJD internal ID of expense[integer($int32)]
fileDataAttachment file content (base64 encoded)[string($byte)]
fileIdJD internal ID of field[integer($int64)]
fileNameFile name[string]
fileTypeFile type[string]
invoiceIdJD internal ID of invoice[integer($int64)]
backgroundcheck1 if background check is needed or 0 if not neededboolean
billratecurrencyCurrency to be used for bill rate. Common values are USD, Pound & Euro. Other values retrievable at Settings/Financial/Rate Units/Currencystring
billrateunitUnit to be used for bill rate. Common values are Year, Day & Hour. Other values retrievable at Settings/Financial/Rate Unitsstring
cityJob citystring
companyidJD internal company IDinteger($int64)
contactfirstnameContact first name and last name; used for searching contact. This contact will be shown on job.Only used if contactsisnot defined, and both contactfirstname, contactlastnameanddepartmentare defined.string
contactlastnameContact first name and last name; used for searching contact. This contact will be shown on job.Only used if contactsisnot defined, and both contactfirstname, contactlastnameanddepartmentare defined.string
contactsAdd contactsarray[object]
action1 to insert owner or 2 to delete contact[integer($int32)]
contactIdJD internal ID of the contact you wish to assign to the job[integer($int64)]
roleIdJD internal ID of the contact's role. Values retrievable through Settings/Labels/Contact Roles[integer($int64)]
showOnJobSet as true to show contact on job or false otherwise[boolean]
countryidTwo-letter abbreviation of countrystring
departmentCompany depatment namestring
descriptionJob description. Will default as "Job Description" if not assignedstring
divisionidJD internal division ID. Values retrievable at Settings/My Team/User Divisionsinteger($int64)
drugtestSet as true if job requires drug test or false otherwiseboolean
enddateJob end date (format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.339Z)string($date-time)
excludedskillsAdd excluded skill(s)array[object]
skillTypePlease set a skill as following Patterns:
ECLIPSE~0~0.0~1~1
ASP.NET~1~0.0~0~0
.NET~1~0.0~1~0
ORACLE~0~0.0~0~1
Set a skill name before the 1st ~.
Set 1 for an alternating skill before the 2nd ~(ASP.NET and .NET are both alternating skill for ECLIPSE in the example above).
Set 1 for a recent skill after the 3rd ~(ECLIPSE and .NET).
Set 1 for agent search w/o mapping after the 4th ~(ECLIPSE and ORACLE). 		string
experienceSet Experience Level to <1 Years if experience equals to 0.
Set Experience Level to >10 Years if experience is greater than 10.		integer($int32)
fillsNumber of fillsinteger($int32)
harvestValid values are: NOW, On Schedule & Not Scheduled (Case Insensitive). Defaults to 'Not Scheduled' if set in Team Profile or 'On Schedule' otherwise.string
hidemeandmycompanySet as true to hide me & my company or false otherwiseboolean
hidemyclientSet as true tohide my client or false otherwise. Defaults to true if not specifiedboolean
hidemyclientaddressSet as true to hide my client's address or false otherwiseboolean
jobtypeJob Type values(case insensitive): Direct Placement, Contract, Right to Hire & Dull Time/Contract. Other values retrievable at Settings/Labels/Position Typesstring
maxbillrateMaximum bill ratenumber($double)
maxpayrateMaximum pay ratenumber($double)
maxsubmittalsMaximum allowed submittalsinteger($int32)
minbillrateMinimum bill ratenumber($double)
minpayrateMinimum pay ratenumber($double)
openingsNumber of job openingsinteger($int32)
optionalrefClient reference numberstring
overtimeSet as true if job includes overtime or false otherwiseboolean
payratecurrencyCurrency to be used for pay rate. Common values are USD, Pound & Euro. Other values retrievable at Settings/Financial/Rate Units/Currencystring
payrateunitUnit to be used for pay rate. Common values are Year, Day & Hour. Other values retrievable at Settings/Financial/Rate Units/Currencystring
priorityJob priority values (A,B,C,D). Other values retrievable from Settings/Labels/Job Prioritystring
referenceSet as true if job requires reference or false otherwiseboolean
remarksRemarksstring
resumesNo. of resumes harvested, minimum 10. Valid only when 'NOW' is chosen for harvest, and defaults to maximum resume numberinteger($int32)
securityclearanceSet as true if job requires security clearance or false otherwiseboolean
skillsAdd skill(s)array[object]
skilltypePlease set a skill as following Patterns:
ECLIPSE~0~0.0~1~1
ASP.NET~1~0.0~0~0
.NET~1~0.0~1~0
ORACLE~0~0.0~0~1
Set a skill name before the 1st ~.
Set 1 for an alternating skill before the 2nd ~(ASP.NET and .NET are both alternating skill for ECLIPSE in the example above).
Set 1 for a recent skill after the 3rd ~(ECLIPSE and .NET).
Set 1 for agent search w/o mapping after the 4th ~(ECLIPSE and ORACLE). 		string
skillstatesSkill state. Spell full or two-letter abbreviationstring
skillzipcodeSkill zip code, mandatory if skillzipcodemiles is setstring
skillzipcodemilesMiles within skillzipcodesting
startdateJob start date, defaults to issued date if it's not set (format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.339Z)string($date-time)
stateJob state. Spell full or two-letter abbreviationstring
statusJob status (0 - OPEN; 1 - ON HOLD; 2 - FILLED; 3 - CANCELLED; 4 - CLOSED; 5 - EXPIRED; 6 - IGNORED)integer($int32)
submittalinstructionSubmittal instructionsstring
titleJob titlestring
travelSet as true if job requires travel or false otherwiseboolean
userfieldsAdd user defined field(s)array[object]
userfieldIdInternal JD UDF ID. Retrievable from Settings/Customize/Job UDFs[integer($int32)]
userfieldValueDesired value of user defined field being added[string]
usersAdd/delete users to job and assign rolesarray[object]
actionSet as 1 to add user or 2 to remove user[integer($int32)]
roleIdJD internal ID of user role. Valid values are: Primary Recruiter, Recruiter, Primary Sales&Sales. Other values retrievable at Settings/Customize/User Roles[integer($int64)]
userIdJD internal ID of a user. Retrievable using UsersList API[integer($int64)]
zipcodeJob zip codestring

parameters.name: updateContactDef
parameters.description:
contactid : Contact ID 
firstname : Contact First Name 
lastname : Contact Last Name 
title : Title 
companyid : Company ID 
department : Department 
addresses :  Array of ContactAddressType
 Set default to true for a default address. One and only one address can be set as default.
 Set action to 1 for insertion or updates, 2 for deletion. 
 
phones :  Set at most 4 phone numbers.
 Set numbers and extensions in phone and ext respectively.
 Set action to 1 for insertion.
 Do not set extensions for types other than work phone or pager.
Valid type (case insensitive)
Value
Description
W
Work #
H
Home #
C
Cell #
F
Work Fax
X
Home Fax
P
Pager
M
Main #
D
Direct #
O
Other # 
 
reportsto : Contact ID of a customer being reported to 
active : Active 
 primary : Primary Contact 
email : Email 
alternateemail : Alternate Email 
types : Contact types to update to. If specified, previous type assignment will be removed. 
assistantname : Assistant Name 
assistantemail : Assistant Email 
assistantphone : Assistant Phone 
assistantphoneextension : Assistant Phone Extension 
subguidelines : Submittal Instructions 
maxsubmittals : Max Allowed Submittals 
references : References 
drugtest : Drug Test 
backgroundcheck : Background Check 
securityclearance : Security Clearance 
Userfields : User defined fields. Valid userfieldid can be found through Leader Tools  My Team  User-Defined Fields  Contacts  UDF # 
owners : Owner

parameters.name: updateJobDef
parameters.description:
jobid : Job ID 
optionalref : Client reference number 
title : Job title 
description : Job description 
postingtitle : Job posting title 
postingdescription : Job posting description 
companyid : Company internal ID 
contacts :  Job contacts
Fields in ContactRoleType:
 Valid roleid values can be found through Settings (wheel icon at the top)  Labels  Contact Roles.
 Set showonjob to true for one and only one contact.
 Set action to 1 for insertion or update, 2 for deletion. 
 
users :  Fields in UserRoleType:
 Valid role values (case insensitive):
o Sales
o Primary Sales
o Recruiter
o Primary Recruiter
o For users of multiple role types, separate\r\n" //roles with any non-alphabetic characters.
 Set action to 1 for insertion or update, 2 for deletion. 
 
address1 : Address 1 
address2 : Address 2 
city : City 
state : State 
zipcode : Postal zip code 
countryid : Country ID 
startdate : Job start date 
enddate : Job end date 
status : Job status
Value
Description
0
OPEN
1
ON HOLD
2
FILLED
3
CANCELLED
4
CLOSED
5
EXPIRED
6
IGNORED 
 
jobtype : Job Type values(case insensitive):
 Direct Placement
 Contract
 Right to Hire
 Full Time/Contract 
 
priority : Job priority values (case insensitive):
 A
 B
 C
 D
 User-Defined Priority. Value as string type of Integer.
For example: 5, 6
Mapping can be found through Settings (Wheel icon) LabelsJob Priority 
 
openings : Number of job openings 
fills : Number of fills 
maxsubmittals : Max Allowed Submittals 
hidemyclient : Hide my client 
hidemyclientaddress : Hide my client's address 
hidemeandmycompany : Hide me & my company 
overtime : Overtime 
reference : References 
travel : Travel 
drugtest : Drug Test 
backgroundcheck : Background Check 
securityclearance : Security Clearance 
remarks : Remarks 
submittalinstruction : Submittal Instructions 
minbillrate : Minimum bill rate 
maxbillrate : Maximum bill rate 
minpayrate : Minimum pay rate 
maxpayrate : Maximum pay rate 
Userfields : User defined fields. Valid userfieldid can be found through Leader Tools  My Team  User-Defined Fields  Jobs  UDF # 
harvest : Valid values(case insentitive):
 NOW
 On Schedule
 Not Scheduled 
 
resumes : No. of resumes harvested, minimum 10. Valid only when NOW is chosen for harvest, and defaults to maximum resume number. 
divisionid : Valid division id can be found through Leader Tools  My Team  Manage Divisions. 
Please set a skill as following Patterns:
ECLIPSE~0~0.0~1~1
ASP.NET~1~0.0~0~0
.NET~1~0.0~1~0
ORACLE~0~0.0~0~1
 Set a skill name before the 1st ~.
 Set 1 for an alternating skill before the 2nd ~(ASP.NET and .NET are both alternating skill for ECLIPSE in the example above).
 Set 1 for a recent skill after the 3rd ~(ECLIPSE and .NET).
 Set 1 for agent search w/o mapping after the 4th ~(ECLIPSE and ORACLE).

parameters.name: uploadResume
parameters.description:
filename : Please add the correct file type when sending the resume. These file types include .pdf, .docx, .rtf, .txt  
 filecontent : Resume file content 
 textfile : Alternate text resume 
 candidateid : If provided, the resume would be added under this candidate. Otherwise, the system will try to match the resume to an existing candidate based on profile in the resume, or create a new candidate record if there is no match 
 resumesource: This allows to tag the resume with a particular source  in JobDiva. The ID can be retrieved from the JobDiva interface under the  Manage Resume Sources 
 recruiterid : Recruiter ID 
 resumeDate : String Format [MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss]
